Name: SkyFactory4
Overview: SkyFactory 4 Modded Minecraft Server[br]Back again for more modded skyblock fun! SkyFactory 4 offers a brand-new experience never before seen in the series. Full automation, tech, magic, and bacon resources! This iteration offers over 30+ world types so you can play the pack like never before! While some world types are based on the classic tree on dirt others are designed with unique recipes and advancements.[br]Version 4.2.2[br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

@attributes.Name: Installed Location
@attributes.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

@attributes.Name: EULA
@attributes.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting.

@attributes.Name: OPS
@attributes.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

@attributes.Name: Port
@attributes.Description: Port for the server. Ignored if using a dedicated IP for the container.

@attributes.Name: LEVEL
@attributes.Description: Name of the world directory.  It is usually world.
